content.text: We continue growing and are looking to add a Data Scientist to our team to work on projects across the world.
Responsibilities:

items: Design and implement statistical and machine learning models
Interest in complex problems. Eager to learn about data exploration, discovery, analysis and modeling tools
Design performance metrics and productive impact of solutions

content.text: Requirements:

items: Graduated from Exact Sciences, Economics, Mathematics, Statistics, Actuarial Science, Engineering or related careers
5 years experience required in projects with data processing and development of descriptive analytics and/or diagnostic models
2 years experience required in data science, predictive and/or prescriptive modeling
Proficiency in programming languages for large scale data analytics: R or Python
Good working knowledge of SQL, NoSQL, Hadoop, Map Reduce, Spark, Hive, HBase, BigQuery, Scala
Ability to study new problems and seek solutions

Proactive professionals who are committed to results, with strong analytical skills, who understand the dynamics of the consulting market and with strong ability to adapt to dynamic and challenging environments

At Ceibo Digital we are looking for you! ðŸ™Œ
Responsibilities
As a Full Stack Senior Developer you will be part of innovative, high impact, challenging and agile projects, being responsible for:

items: Actively participate in all phases of the software development lifecycle
Participate in the development and implementation of new products
Collaborate in the design of solutions at backend and frontend level
Build code complying with standards and quality requirements
Work with integrations to other systems
Perform peer code reviews and technical documentation
